seo.descripcion: A developer in progress — join my journey through React, PHP, MySQL, TypeScript, AWS, and more.
seo.descripcion_formal: Follow my journey as I advance professionally through modern technologies such as React, PHP, MySQL, TypeScript, AWS, and more.

intro.frase: I build things for the web.
intro.frase_formal: I develop and maintain professional-grade web solutions.
intro.descripcion: I'm a developer in progress, currently living in San Juan - Argentina.
intro.descripcion_formal: I am an aspiring software developer based in San Juan, Argentina, continuously enhancing my skills and professional experience.

historia.parrafo1: I'm Exe, a computer enthusiast since I was a kid. At 40, I decided to take a turn in my life. I overcame an illness, and after leaving the hospital, I stopped chasing material things. I chose to do what I love and let everything else follow as a result of my passion for living and learning.
historia.parrafo1_formal: My name is Exe. I have had a deep passion for computing since childhood. At the age of 40, following a significant health recovery, I chose to reevaluate my priorities and focus on what truly inspires me—technology and continuous learning.
historia.parrafo2: I quit my job and started working with computers—a tough decision since I don’t live alone, but with my partner, and already had my first child (now I have two). I've always dreamed of working in something tech-related, and I'm turning that dream into reality. This site is part of that journey—a place where I’ll be sharing what I learn, experimenting with new ideas, and growing.
historia.parrafo2_formal: Leaving my previous job to pursue a career in technology was a challenging yet rewarding decision, especially while supporting a family. I am now fulfilling a long-standing aspiration to work in the tech field. This website serves as a platform to document my learning journey, showcase innovative ideas, and demonstrate my professional growth.

certificados.file: Certificado Meta - Introduction to Front-End Development
certificados.label: Meta Certificate - Introduction to Front-End Development

certificados.label: UNLPAM Certificate - Web Layout with HTML 5 and CSS

certificados.file: Certificado UNLPAM - Programación Web con PHP y MySQL
certificados.label: UNLPAM Certificate - Web Programming with PHP and MySQL

github.parrafo1: This is my public repository. Here I will add projects and exercises; most of my projects are private and require permission to be viewed.
github.parrafo1_formal: This is a curated public repository showcasing selected projects and practice work. Many of my projects are private and available upon request.
github.parrafo2: This is a direct excerpt from my personal wiki. This year, I decided it was a good idea to create a wiki with everything I learn and build. There are many things I didn't document at the time, and now I'm trying to maintain a record that helps me learn and maintain some structure, order, strategies, and personal reflections about what I learn and create. This excerpt would be a summary of my personal wiki.
github.parrafo2_formal: This excerpt is derived from a personal knowledge base I maintain. I created this resource to organize and reflect on my learning journey and development practices, ensuring a structured and strategic approach to continuous improvement.

contacto.exito_formal: Your message has been successfully submitted.
contacto.error_formal: An error occurred while processing your request.
contacto.success_contact_form: Thank you for your message. I will reply soon.
contacto.success_contact_form_formal: Thank you for reaching out. I will review your message and respond promptly.
contacto.error_contact_form: The message could not be sent. Please try again later.
contacto.error_contact_form_formal: Unfortunately, your message could not be delivered at this time. Please try again shortly.
contacto.invalid_email: The email address is not valid.
contacto.invalid_email_formal: The email address entered does not meet the required format.
contacto.missing_fields_formal: All fields are required. Kindly ensure the form is fully completed before submitting.
contacto.rate_limit_exceeded: Please wait a moment before sending another message.
contacto.rate_limit_exceeded_formal: You have reached the submission limit. Please wait a moment before attempting to send another message.
